title: How to start reading psychology since I'm really interested - Quora

response.answer_text: There's loads around to grab hold of Try searching online for ones you maybe interested in And then order them from your library it's just a small charge and a waiting list There maybe already some good ones available The college library also a good place I was subscribed to a monthly magazine that was good for quick articles and new book titles to check out There's also loads of articles, information online websites to check out Or courses to do if it's an education you require And observe people and yourself Take care happy reading :)
